sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_vsc.SCMetricsUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SCMetricsUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SCMetricsUtil = Class.create();
SCMetricsUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getKPIPageParams: function() {
        var pageParams = {
            "ebd7a7676bb01110638c83eece44afa3": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "ebd7a7676bb01110638c83eece44afa3",
                    "listTable": "sn_vsc_icenter_privileged_users_details",
                    "listTitle": "Inactive privileged users",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('usr_active=false'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_sys_created_on",
                    "listColumns": "usr_user_name,usr_name,userrole_role,usr_email,usr_active,usr_sys_created_on,usr_sys_updated_on"
                }
            },
            "ed466b3377701110638cfe21fe5a99bd": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "ed466b3377701110638cfe21fe5a99bd",
                    "listTable": "sn_vsc_icenter_privileged_users_details",
                    "listTitle": "New Privileged users",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('usr_sys_created_onONLast 30 days@javascript:gs.beginningOfLast30Days()@javascript:gs.endOfLast30Days()'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_sys_created_on",
                    "listColumns": "usr_user_name,usr_name,userrole_role,usr_email,usr_active,usr_sys_created_on,usr_sys_updated_on"
                }
            },
            "d3a921c3778521101b803a91fa5a99b7": {
                "route": "sc_kp_details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "d3a921c3778521101b803a91fa5a99b7",
                    "listTable": "adaptive_auth_event",
                    "listTitle": "Authenticated user logins",
                    "listSort": encodeURIComponent('ORDERBYDESCsys_created_on^event_type!=pre_login'),
                    "listColumns": "user_name,auth_policy,auth_policy_context,default_policy,result,event_source,event_type,mfa_policy_context,sys_created_on"
                }
            },
            "96cb944777b12110c6213a91fa5a998e": {
                "route": "sc_kp_details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "96cb944777b12110c6213a91fa5a998e",
                    "listTable": "sc_rest_api_without_access_policy",
                    "listTitle": "REST APIs Without Access Policy",
                    "listSort": encodeURIComponent('ORDERBYDESCsys_created_on'),
                    "listColumns": "api_name,api_path"
                }
            },
            "ac34abbf77301110638cfe21fe5a996f": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "ac34abbf77301110638cfe21fe5a996f",
                    "listTable": "sn_vsc_icenter_privileged_users_details",
                    "listTitle": "Privileged users never logged in",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('internal_integration_user=false^ORinternal_integration_userISEMPTY^web_service_access_only=true^active=false'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_sys_created_on",
                    "listColumns": "user_name,name,email,active,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on"
                }
            },
            "826dc36777d52110c6213a91fa5a990b": {
                "route": "sc_kp_details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "826dc36777d52110c6213a91fa5a990b",
                    "listTable": "adaptive_auth_event",
                    "listTitle": "Authenticated users",
                    "listSort": encodeURIComponent('ORDERBYDESCsys_created_on^event_type!=pre_login^user_nameISNOTEMPTY'),
                    "listColumns": "user_name,auth_policy,auth_policy_context,default_policy,result,event_source,event_type,mfa_policy_context,sys_created_on"
                }
            },
            "f6476f276bb01110638c83eece44afec": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "f6476f276bb01110638c83eece44afec",
                    "listTable": "sn_vsc_icenter_privileged_users_details",
                    "listTitle": "Active privileged users",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('usr_active=true'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_name",
                    "listColumns": "usr_user_name,usr_name,userrole_role,usr_email,usr_active,usr_sys_created_on,usr_sys_updated_on"
                }
            },
            "54a8e97feb011110f32fed9c425228b4": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "54a8e97feb011110f32fed9c425228b4",

                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('login_status=FAILURE^privileged_user=true'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESClogin_time",

                }

            "2952237f77301110638cfe21fe5a99d8": {

                    "listTitle": "Privileged users need to reset password",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('usr_password_needs_reset=true'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_sys_created_on",
                    "listColumns": "usr_user_name,usr_name,userrole_role,usr_email,usr_active,usr_sys_created_on,usr_sys_updated_on"
                }
            },
            "a03ae5c3778521101b803a91fa5a998d": {
                "route": "sc_kp_details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "a03ae5c3778521101b803a91fa5a998d",
                    "listTable": "adaptive_auth_event",
                    "listTitle": "API user logins",
                    "listSort": encodeURIComponent('ORDERBYDESCsys_created_on^api_auth_policiesISNOTEMPTY'),
                    "listColumns": "user_name,api_auth_policies,auth_policy,auth_policy_context,default_policy,result,event_source,event_type,mfa_policy_context,sys_created_on"
                }
            },
            "fff086be770521101b803a91fa5a99cf": {
                "route": "sc_kp_details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "fff086be770521101b803a91fa5a99cf",
                    "listTable": "adaptive_auth_event",
                    "listTitle": "Policy result rates",
                    "listSort": encodeURIComponent('ORDERBYDESCsys_created_on^result!='),
                    "listColumns": "user_name,auth_policy,auth_policy_context,default_policy,result,event_source,event_type,mfa_policy_context,sys_created_on"
                }
            },
            "d9867c266b411110638c83eece44af20": {
                "route": "identity-center-details",
                "fields": {
                    "indicatorId": "d9867c266b411110638c83eece44af20",
                    "listTable": "sys_user_login_history",
                    "listTitle": "User sessions",
                    "listFilter": encodeURIComponent('login_status=success^logout_timeISEMPTY'),
                    "listSort": "ORDERBYDESCusr_sys_created_on",
                    "listColumns": "ORDERBYDESClogin_time&listColumns=user.user_name,user.name,login_time,user_agent,ip,privileged_user"
                }
            }
        };
        return pageParams;
    },
    type: 'SCMetricsUtil'
};]]></script>
